titlestmt.sponsor: This collection-level EAD record is a product of the Philadelphia Area Consortium of Special Collections Libraries (PACSCL) Consortial Survey Initiative, which was funded by the Andrew W. Mellon Foundation.

profiledesc.creation: Machine-readable finding aid generated in EAD from data in the PACSCL Consortial Survey Database on 12/21/2012. Modified by Dot Porter in 2017.

bioghist.p: Presbyterian Women (PW) is the national women's organization of the Presbyterian Church (U.S.A.). Nancy B. Davison worked as a volunteer with Presbyterian Women from 1985 to 1994. She served on the National Executive Committee of Presbyterian Women during the 1985-1988 Triennium as the representative from the Synod of Alaska-Northwest. During the 1991-1994 Triennium, she served on the Churchwide Search Committee as the representative from the Western region of the United States.

scopecontent.p: This collection consists of materials compiled by Nancy B. Davis during her association with Presbyterian Women. The materials are related to volunteer services with Presbyterian Women including subject files; photographs; notebooks; filmstrip "In the Image of God" from the 1979 UPW National Meeting; and slides from the 1988 PW Churchwide Gathering, with a list identifying slides. Also included are materials from various meetings between 1985 and 1994, including National Meeting of United Presbyterian Women, Churchwide Gathering of Presbyterian Women, Business Meeting of Presbyterian Women, National Executive Committee Meeting and PW Enabler Training. These materials include agendas, programs, meeting minutes, planning notes, reports, photographs of meetings, and newsletters.

accessrestrict.p: Access to this collection is restricted; please contact the holding institution for details.
